name: Karnanny – VR
description:
Experience the realistic thrilling adventure of horror world in Karnanny VR Game. The most horror escape game where unexpected events happen often. You are locked in an old scary haunted house full of terrors and grimes. Dead bodies Karnanny and zombies can attack from anywhere. There are a whole lot of scares escapes. Hide careful and return to find escape fast or you’ll be dead. 

Haunted House  

You are stuck in a scary haunted house full of terrors with multiple rooms and escape doors. Search for guns and axe in every floor to attack enemies.

Hints and Riddles 

Stay alert and be focused. Search for the hints and solve riddles to get through this Haunted House. 

Enemies with Deadly Pets 

Karnanny with Kopek Uncle including many scary enemies and pets are in search of you. They will kill you in no time. Run and escape fast. 

Risky Escapes 

In this game you will find death escapes and scary hurdles. Run and jump to get through all of them and save your life from karnanny.
